button.style: background: -moz-linear-gradient(50% 0% , rgb(138, 221, 109), rgb(96, 176, 68)) repeat-x scroll 0% 0% rgb(96, 176, 68); background-blend-mode: normal; -moz-binding: none; -moz-border-bottom-colors: none; border-collapse: separate; border-left-color: rgb(92, 169, 65); -moz-border-left-colors: none; border-right-color: rgb(92, 169, 65); -moz-border-right-colors: none; border-spacing: 0px; border-top-color: rgb(92, 169, 65); -moz-border-top-colors: none; border-top-style: solid; border-radius: 3px; bottom: 0px; box-decoration-break: slice; box-shadow: 0px 1px 3px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05); box-sizing: border-box; caption-side: top; clear: none; clip: auto; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); -moz-columns: auto auto; -moz-column-fill: balance; -moz-column-gap: 13px; -moz-column-rule: 0px none rgb(255, 255, 255); content: none; counter-increment: none; counter-reset: none; cursor: pointer; direction: ltr; display: inline-block; empty-cells: show; align-content: stretch; align-items: stretch; align-self: stretch; flex: 0 1 auto; flex-wrap: nowrap; order: 0; justify-content: flex-start; float: none; -moz-float-edge: content-box; font: 700 13px/18.2px Helvetica,arial,freesans,clean,sans-serif; -moz-force-broken-image-icon: 0; height: 48px; image-orientation: 0deg; -moz-image-region: auto; ime-mode: auto; left: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; list-style: outside none disc; marker-offset: auto; max-height: none; max-width: none; min-height: 0px; min-width: 0px; mix-blend-mode: normal; opacity: 1; -moz-orient: auto; outline: 0px none rgb(0, 0, 0); outline-offset: 0px; overflow: visible; padding: 7px 15px; page-break-after: auto; page-break-before: auto; page-break-inside: auto; paint-order: normal; pointer-events: auto; position: relative; quotes: "“" "”" "‘" "’"; resize: none; right: 0px; table-layout: auto; text-align: center; -moz-text-align-last: auto; -moz-text-decoration-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); -moz-text-decoration-line: none; -moz-text-decoration-style: solid; text-indent: 0px; text-overflow: clip; text-shadow: 0px -1px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25); -moz-text-size-adjust: auto; text-transform: none; transform: none; transform-origin: 94.5px 24px 0px; perspective-origin: 94.5px 24px; perspective: none; transform-style: flat; backface-visibility: visible; top: 0px; unicode-bidi: normal; -moz-user-focus: none; -moz-user-input: auto; -moz-user-modify: read-only; -moz-user-select: none; vertical-align: middle; visibility: visible; white-space: nowrap; width: 189px; -moz-window-shadow: default; word-break: normal; word-spacing: 0px; word-wrap: normal; -moz-hyphens: manual; z-index: auto; -moz-box-align: stretch; -moz-box-direction: normal; -moz-box-flex: 0; -moz-box-orient: horizontal; -moz-box-pack: start; -moz-box-ordinal-group: 1; -moz-stack-sizing: stretch-to-fit; clip-path: none; clip-rule: nonzero; color-interpolation: srgb; color-interpolation-filters: linearrgb; dominant-baseline: auto; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; fill-rule: nonzero; filter: none; flood-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); flood-opacity: 1; image-rendering: auto; lighting-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); marker: none; mask: none; shape-rendering: auto; stop-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); stop-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-dashoffset: 0px; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 1px; text-anchor: start; text-rendering: auto; vector-effect: none; transition: all 0s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.1, 0.25, 1) 0s; animation: 0s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.1, 0.25, 1) 0s normal none 1 running none;

span.style: background: none repeat scroll 0% 0% transparent; background-blend-mode: normal; -moz-binding: none; -moz-border-bottom-colors: none; border-collapse: separate; border-left-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); -moz-border-left-colors: none; border-right-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); -moz-border-right-colors: none; border-spacing: 0px; border-top-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); -moz-border-top-colors: none; border-top-style: none; border-radius: 0px; bottom: auto; box-decoration-break: slice; box-shadow: none; box-sizing: content-box; caption-side: top; clear: none; clip: auto; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); -moz-columns: auto auto; -moz-column-fill: balance; -moz-column-gap: 14.3px; -moz-column-rule: 0px none rgb(255, 255, 255); content: none; counter-increment: none; counter-reset: none; cursor: pointer; direction: ltr; display: inline; empty-cells: show; align-content: stretch; align-items: stretch; align-self: stretch; flex: 0 1 auto; flex-wrap: nowrap; order: 0; justify-content: flex-start; float: none; -moz-float-edge: content-box; font: 700 14.3px/30px Helvetica,arial,freesans,clean,sans-serif; -moz-force-broken-image-icon: 0; height: auto; image-orientation: 0deg; -moz-image-region: auto; ime-mode: auto; left: auto; letter-spacing: normal; list-style: outside none disc; margin: 0px 0px 0px 7px; marker-offset: auto; max-height: none; max-width: none; min-height: 0px; min-width: 0px; mix-blend-mode: normal; opacity: 1; -moz-orient: auto; outline: 0px none rgb(0, 0, 0); outline-offset: 0px; overflow: visible; padding: 0px; page-break-after: auto; page-break-before: auto; page-break-inside: auto; paint-order: normal; pointer-events: auto; position: static; quotes: "“" "”" "‘" "’"; resize: none; right: auto; table-layout: auto; text-align: center; -moz-text-align-last: auto; -moz-text-decoration-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); -moz-text-decoration-line: none; -moz-text-decoration-style: solid; text-indent: 0px; text-overflow: clip; text-shadow: 0px -1px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25); -moz-text-size-adjust: auto; text-transform: none; transform: none; transform-origin: 72px 9.5px 0px; perspective-origin: 72px 9.5px; perspective: none; transform-style: flat; backface-visibility: visible; top: auto; unicode-bidi: normal; -moz-user-focus: none; -moz-user-input: auto; -moz-user-modify: read-only; z-index: auto; -moz-box-align: stretch; -moz-box-direction: normal; -moz-box-flex: 0; -moz-box-orient: horizontal; -moz-box-pack: start; -moz-box-ordinal-group: 1; -moz-stack-sizing: stretch-to-fit; clip-path: none; flood-opacity: 1; image-rendering: auto; lighting-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); marker: none; mask: none; shape-rendering: auto; stop-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); stop-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-dashoffset: 0px; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 1px; text-anchor: start; text-rendering: auto; vector-effect: none; transition: all 0s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.1, 0.25, 1) 0s;
